TopicTitle: Crashing on start with a excrements ton of mods

Articles.Content:
here are my mods
 

 Just like the title says, i´ve downloaded many mods (as seen in the pictures) and now my game crashes after ca. 4/5 mins of loading.

 

               The log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/2jt7yuvqcq9iu2h/error.log?dl=

               The log:https://www.dropbox.com/s/n05hsn62pqvsbat/KSP.log?dl=0

Edited September 24, 2018 by iluvitwhenthegamecrashes

What the heck else are you running that is taking 13gb of RAM?     That may be part of the problem, but you have enough free space that that shouldn't be the only issue.

We'll need the KSP.log though.

On ‎9‎/‎15‎/‎2018 at 6:37 PM, Gargamel said:

What the heck else are you running that is taking 13gb of RAM?     That may be part of the problem, but you have enough free space that that shouldn't be the only issue.

We'll need the KSP.log though. 

 

 

 

13 gigs is recorded at the time of the log generation. that would include the loaded game and its mods.

I have 32gigs and I have seen this game consume12-14 gigs after loading..(70 mods)without any planet packs.. they add way more

I didn't get to view any pics here.. says they are gone/link is incorrect. I have been able to copy my log while the game loads (just prior to crashing) to see what is happening as it goes. maybe this could give you info.  there was a thread about in the direct x 9, xinput1.3 file. not sure if that may help to try to implement. 

Hope this helps

Jammer

23 hours ago, Jammer-TD said:

13 gigs is recorded at the time of the log generation. that would include the loaded game and its mods.

I have 32gigs and I have seen this game consume12-14 gigs after loading..(70 mods)without any planet packs.. they add way more

I didn't get to view any pics here.. says they are gone/link is incorrect. I have been able to copy my log while the game loads (just prior to crashing) to see what is happening as it goes. maybe this could give you info.  there was a thread about in the direct x 9, xinput1.3 file. not sure if that may help to try to implement. 

Hope this helps

Jammer

Jeah... sorry for the thing with the Imgur-link not working. Im just to dumb to understand where the feck to find the "Album Code" + Im not that good with code so it wouldn`t help me to read the Log as it goes (oh and btw.: which log?).

 

Edited September 23, 2018 by iluvitwhenthegamecrashes
the "ksp.log" in the root of KSP "(drive:)(root of game location)\kerbalspaceprogram\ksp.log" "ex:: c:\program files\kerbalspaceprogram\ksp.log"

Sooo.... I think i got everything right this time.

oh and i think i know why it crashes while loading (but not really); the last thing that showed up in the loading Bar was: Squad/Parts/Utillity/dockingPortSr/dockingPortSr/docking...(the rest was obscured by the window)

Edited September 24, 2018 by iluvitwhenthegamecrashes

um  I would start by validating the game files thru steam(assuming a steam install). 

 it appears to be a version type of error issue too me. I would validate all mod are updated(manually) and installed properly and with it's supporting dependents needed.

in particular is the fmrs mod, this seems to thow the most errors items at you. most of this looks very normal and proper

hope this helps

Jammer
